summary: REQ-20 and REQ-21 appear implemented in HomePage hero: exact H1 text is present, hero keeps full-bleed background image with stronger overlays and high-contrast styling, and primary CTA navigates to /builder with English supporting copy. Diff also includes broader visual/theme and navigation/routing changes that go beyond the requested Home page hero update.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/color system changes (vibrant tech/crypto palette, typography defaults, new utilities/animations) beyond updating the Home page hero section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is to update the Home page hero content/styling; global CSS/theme changes are not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Router/app-level updates including a 'new builder page' route.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states: "Do not redesign global navigation or add new pages/routes beyond updating the Home page hero"; adding a new route/page goes beyond the request (even if the CTA points to /builder).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/App.tsx: mentions routes including "the new builder page")

hallucinated_features.description: Global navigation update adding an 'AI App Builder' link in the app shell header.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal states not to redesign global navigation; adding a new nav item is a navigation change not requested by REQ-20/REQ-21 (which only require a hero CTA to /builder and not breaking existing secondary options).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: mentions new "AI App Builder" link)
